Module Documentation¶

api¶

class api.nh_clinical_api(pool, cr)[source]¶
admit(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Admits a patient into the specified location. :param hospital_number: Hospital number of the patient :param data: dictionary parameter that may contain the following keys: location: location code where the patient will be admitted. REQUIRED start_date: admission start date. doctors: consulting and referring doctors list of dictionaries. expected format: [...{‘type’: ‘c’ or ‘r’, ‘code’: code string, ‘title’:, ‘given_name’:, ‘family_name’:, }...] if doctor doesn’t exist, we create partner, but don’t create user for that doctor.

admit_update(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Updates the spell information of the patient. Accepts the same parameters as admit.

cancel_admit(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Cancels the open admission of the patient.

cancel_discharge(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Cancels the last discharge of the patient.

cancel_transfer(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Cancels the last transfer of the patient.

discharge(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Discharges the patient. :param hospital_number: Hospital number of the patient :param data: dictionary parameter that may contain the following keys: discharge_date: patient discharge date.

merge(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Merges a specified patient into the patient. :param hospital_number: Hospital number of the patient we want to merge INTO :param data: dictionary parameter that may contain the following keys: from_identifier: Hospital number of the patient we want to merge FROM

register(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Registers a new patient into the system :param hospital_number: Hospital Number of the patient :param data: dictionary parameter that may contain the following keys: patient_identifier: NHS number family_name: Surname given_name: Name middle_names: Middle names dob: Date of birth gender: Gender (M/F) sex: Sex (M/F)

transfer(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Transfers the patient to the specified location. :param hospital_number: Hospital number of the patient :param data: dictionary parameter that may contain the following keys: location: location code where the patient will be transferred. REQUIRED

update(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Update patient information

adt¶

class adt.nh_clinical_adt_patient_register(pool, cr)[source]¶
Registers a new patient into the system.
patient_identifier: String - NHS Number other_identifier: String - Hospital Number given_name: String - First name family_name: String - Last name middle_names: String - Middle names dob: String - Date of Birth, have to be in format ‘%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S’ gender: String - ‘BOTH’,’F’,’I’,’M’,’NSP’,’U’ sex: String - Same values as gender. ethnicity: String - Look at patient class for the list of allowed values.
class adt.nh_clinical_adt_patient_update(pool, cr)[source]¶

Update patient information. It will overwrite every single field in the target patient. Same fields as patient register.

class adt.nh_clinical_adt_patient_admit(pool, cr)[source]¶
Generates a patient Admission to the provided Location. It will generate a new ward location if it does not exist.

consulting and referring doctors are expected in the submitted values on key=’doctors’ in format: [... { ‘type’: ‘c’ or ‘r’, ‘code’: code string, ‘title’:, ‘given_name’:, ‘family_name’:, } ...]

if doctor doesn’t exist, we create partner, but don’t create user

class adt.nh_clinical_adt_patient_cancel_admit(pool, cr)[source]¶

Cancels the last admission of the patient which cancels the current patient spell.

class adt.nh_clinical_adt_patient_discharge(pool, cr)[source]¶

Discharge a patient from the hospital. Completes the patient spell.

class adt.nh_clinical_adt_patient_cancel_discharge(pool, cr)[source]¶

Cancels the last patient discharge. The spell will be reopened. This will fail if the patient has already been admitted again.

class adt.nh_clinical_adt_patient_transfer(pool, cr)[source]¶

Transfers a patient from a location to another location. It will trigger admission policy in the destination location.

class adt.nh_clinical_adt_patient_cancel_transfer(pool, cr)[source]¶

Cancels the last patient transfer. Effectively moving the patient back to the origin location.

class adt.nh_clinical_adt_spell_update(pool, cr)[source]¶

Update patient spell information.

class adt.nh_clinical_adt_patient_merge(pool, cr)[source]¶

Merges a patient into another patient making the resulting patient own all activities.
